const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "idx",
  settings: {
    index: {
      mapping: {
        source: {
          mode: "synthetic",
        },
      },
    },
  },
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      versions: {
        type: "version",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "idx",
  id: 1,
  document: {
    versions: ["8.0.0-beta1", "8.5.0", "0.90.12", "2.6.1", "1.3.4", "1.3.4"],
  },
});
console.log(response1);
